properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 7 at 5:42AM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Georgia...

Lookout Creek near New England affecting Dade and Hamilton
Counties

South Chickamauga Creek near Ringgold affecting Catoosa County

West Chickamauga Creek near Fort Oglethorpe affecting Catoosa and
Hamilton Counties

Conasauga River near Eton affecting Murray and Whitfield Counties

Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton affecting Whitfield
County

Conasauga River near Tilton affecting Gordon...Murray and
Whitfield Counties

The Flood Warning continues for
The Coahulla Creek near Keiths Mill near Dalton.
* Until further notice.
* At 530 AM Friday the stage was 22.2 feet...and rising.
* Minor flooding is occurring and forecast.
* Flood stage is 16 feet.
* The river will rise to near 23 feet this afternoon then fall below
flood stage tomorrow afternoon.
* At 22.feet...Minor flooding continues to expand further into the
pastures...fields and woodlands upstream and downstream from the
Keiths Mill Road bridge. Some areas closer to the creek will be
under 6 feet of water.
